languages.text: {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Боишься перечить мон-кай, дитя теней? Как низко ты пал. Но кого тебе точно стоит опасаться, так это меня. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепетать от ужаса и молить о прощении".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Боишься перечить мон-кай, дитя теней? Как низко ты пал. Но кого тебе точно стоит опасаться, так это меня. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепещать от ужаса и молить о прощении".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Afraid to defy a mon-keigh, are you, child of the shadows? How low you have sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Боишься перечить мон-кай, дитя теней? Как низко ты пал. Но кого тебе точно стоит опасаться, так это меня. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепетать от ужаса и молить о прощении".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sideways glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Afraid to defy a mon-keigh, are you, child of the shadows? How low have you sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble with fear and beg for forgiveness."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

How low you have sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Afraid to defy a mon-keigh, are you, child of the shadows? How low you have sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}El Aeldari mira de soslayo a Marazhai con gesto de desaprobación, y una leve sonrisa de burla asoma a sus delgados labios.{/n} «¿Te asusta llevar la contraria a {mf|un|una} mon-keigh, hijo de las sombras? Qué bajo has caído. Y sin embargo, es a mí a quien deberías temer. Después de todo lo que tu kábala le ha hecho a mi gente, deberías estar temblando de miedo y suplicando mi perdón».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Afraid to defy a mon-keigh, are you, child of the shadows? How low you have sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Aeldari mira de soslayo a Marazhai con gesto de desaprobación, y una leve sonrisa de burla asoma a sus delgados labios.{/n} «¿Te asusta llevar la contraria a {mf|un|una} mon-keigh, hijo de las sombras? Qué bajo has caído. Y sin embargo, es a mí a quien deberías temer. Después de todo lo que tu kábala le ha hecho a mi gente, deberías estar temblando de miedo y suplicando mi perdón».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}アエルダリはマラズハイを不満そうに横目で見ると、かすかな苦笑いを浮かべ、その薄い唇を美しく見せた。{/n}「モン＝ケイに逆らうのが怖いのか、影の子よ。何とも落ちぶれたものだな。だが、お前が最も恐れるべきなのはこの私だ。お前の陰謀団が我がキンにしたことを考えれば、お前は恐怖に震えて許しを請うべきだからな」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Afraid to defy a mon-keigh, are you, child of the shadows? How low you have sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリはマラズハイを不満そうに横目で見ると、かすかな苦笑いを浮かべ、その薄い唇を美しく見せた。{/n}「モン＝ケイに逆らうのが怖いのか、影の子よ。何とも落ちぶれたものだな。だが、お前が最も恐れるべきなのはこの私だ。お前の陰謀団が我がキンにしたことを考えれば、お前は恐怖に震えて許しを請うべきだからな」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}艾达灵族不以为然地斜睨着玛拉斋，薄薄的嘴唇咧出挖苦的微笑。{/n}“你甚至不敢违逆猴子的命令，是吗，暗影之子？你居然已经堕落到了这种程度。不过，我才是你最该害怕的人。你的阴谋团对我的族人做了那么多坏事，你确实该在恐惧中颤抖，乞求原谅。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Afraid to defy a mon-keigh, are you, child of the shadows? How low you have sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾达灵族不以为然地斜睨着玛拉斋，薄薄的嘴唇咧出挖苦的微笑。{/n}“你甚至不敢违逆猴子的命令，是吗，暗影之子？你居然已经堕落到了这种程度。不过，我才是你最该害怕的人。你的阴谋团对我的族人做了那么多坏事，你确实该在恐惧中颤抖，乞求原谅。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}L'Aeldari lance un regard oblique réprobateur à Marazhai, et ses lèvres fines esquissent un sourire narquois.{/n} « Auriez-vous peur de défier {mf|un|une} mon-keigh, enfant de l'ombre ? Vous êtes tombé bien bas. C'est pourtant de moi que vous devriez avoir peur. Après tout ce que votre kabale a fait à mon peuple, vous devriez trembler de terreur et implorer mon pardon. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Afraid to defy a mon-keigh, are you, child of the shadows? How low you have sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari lance un regard oblique réprobateur à Marazhai, et ses lèvres fines esquissent un sourire narquois.{/n} « Auriez-vous peur de défier {mf|un|une} mon-keigh, enfant de l'ombre ? Vous êtes tombé bien bas. C'est pourtant de moi que vous devriez avoir peur. Après tout ce que votre kabale a fait à mon peuple, vous devriez trembler de terreur et implorer mon pardon. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Der Aeldari wirft Marazhai einen missbilligenden Blick von der Seite zu, dabei verformen sich seine schmalen Lippen zu einem leicht schiefen Lächeln.{/n} "Ihr fürchtet Euch vor {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey, Kind der Schatten? Ihr seid so tief gesunken. Dabei bin ich es, den Ihr fürchten solltet. Nach allem, was Eure Kabale meiner Art angetan hat, solltet Ihr vor Furcht erzittern und um Vergebung betteln."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Afraid to defy a mon-keigh, are you, child of the shadows? How low you have sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari wirft Marazhai einen missbilligenden Blick von der Seite zu, dabei verformen sich seine schmalen Lippen zu einem leicht schiefen Lächeln.{/n} "Ihr fürchtet Euch vor {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey, Kind der Schatten? Ihr seid so tief gesunken. Dabei bin ich es, den Ihr fürchten solltet. Nach allem, was Eure Kabale meiner Art angetan hat, solltet Ihr vor Furcht erzittern und um Vergebung betteln."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, Marazhai'a göz ucuyla onaylamaz bir bakış atıyor. Bükülen ince dudakları, belli belirsiz bir gülümseme lütfediyor.{/n} "Bir mon-keigh'e karşı çıkmaktan korkuyor musun gölgelerin çocuğu? Nasıl bu kadar alçalabildin? Hâlbuki asıl korkman gereken benim. Kabalının soydaşlarıma yaptığı onca şeyden sonra korkudan titreyip af dilemelisin."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Afraid to defy a mon-keigh, are you, child of the shadows? How low you have sunk. Yet I am who you most certainly should fear. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari, Marazhai'a göz ucuyla onaylamayan bir bakış atıyor. Bükülen ince dudakları, belli belirsiz bir gülümseme lütfediyor.{/n} "Bir mon-keigh'e karşı çıkmaktan mı korkuyorsun gölgelerin çocuğu? Nasıl bu kadar alçalabildin? Hâlbuki asıl korkman gereken benim. Kabalının soydaşlarıma yaptığı onca şeyden sonra korku içinde titreyip af dilenmen gerek."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
